base constructor.
ScapiRuntimeException(String) - Constructor for exception edu.biu.scapi.exceptions.ScapiRuntimeException
ScapiRuntimeException is thrown when cryptographic operations have been attempted without success and the general interface does not provide a suitable exception.

sqrtModP_3_4(BigInteger, BigInteger) - Static method in class edu.biu.scapi.tools.math.MathAlgorithms
This function calculates the square root of z mod p if and only if p is a prime such that p = 3 mod 4.
StandardGarbledBooleanCircuit - Class in edu.biu.scapi.circuits.garbledCircuit

Statistical - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel
This interface should be used for any primitive, scheme or protocol that achieves statistical security (e.g., a perfect MAC, one-time pad, perfectly-secure multiparty protocol, and so on).
